summary:
TRON Ecosystem - TRON boasts the fastest-growing DApp ecosystem and overtook EOS to be the second largest public chain platform for DApps.

 Token - TRX is widely used in various scenarios including payment, purchases and voting both within and outside the TRON ecosystem.

 Developer - TRONPROTOCOL is the world's leading decentralized blockchain protocol.

 Resources - TRON Crypto ETFs
